    • Method Detail

      • categorize

        Category[] categorize(long master,
                    CDocument doc)
                      throws Exception
        Categorize the given document with configuration of given master.
        This method is a convenience method an simply calls IVCCategorizer.categorizeTags(master, doc).getCategories();
        Parameters:
        master - - the id of vcat configuration
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        sorted Category[] with "best" Category first
        Throws:
        Exception

      • categorizeTags

        VCCategorizerResult categorizeTags(long master,
                                 CDocument doc)
                                   throws Exception
        Categorize the given document with configuration of given master.
        Parameters:
        master - - the id of vcat configuration
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        VCCategorizerResult which encapsulates VCCategoryResult's for matching categories.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • categorize

                             CDocument doc,
                             boolean createDebugResult)
                               throws Exception
        Parameters:
        doc -
        createDebugResult - flag to enable the debug-mode
        Returns:
        Throws:

      • categorize

        Category[] categorize(String master,
                    CDocument doc)
                      throws Exception
        Categorize the given document with configuration of given master.
        This method is a convenience method an simply calls IVCCategorizer.categorizeTags(master, doc).getCategories();
        Parameters:
        master - - the name of vcat configuration
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        sorted Category[] with "best" Category first
        Throws:
        Exception

      • categorizeTags

        VCCategorizerResult categorizeTags(String master,
                                 CDocument doc)
                                   throws Exception
        Categorize the given document with configuration of given master.
        Parameters:
        master - - the name of vcat configuration
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        VCCategorizerResult which encapsulates VCCategoryResult's for matching categories.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
        Exception

      • extract

        VCCategoryResult extract(long master,
                       String cat,
                       CDocument doc)
                         throws Exception
        Extracts data from the given document with configuration of given master and category.
        This will not perform any classification so the relevance of returned VCCategoryResult may be undefined.
        Parameters:
        master - - the id of vcat configuration
        cat - - the category which configuration is used
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        VCCategoryResult of given category
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extract

        VCCategoryResult extract(String master,
                       String cat,
                       CDocument doc)
                         throws Exception
        Extracts data from the given document with configuration of given master and category.
        This will not perform any classification so the relevance of returned VCCategoryResult may be undefined.
        Parameters:
        master - - the name of vcat configuration
        cat - - the category which configuration is used
        doc - - the document to categorize
        Returns:
        VCCategoryResult of given category
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extract

        VCCategoryResult extract(long master,
                       String cat,
                       CDocument doc,
                       boolean tagsOnly)
                         throws Exception
        Extracts data from the given document with configuration of given master and category.
        This method is pretty much the same as extract(String master, String cat, CDocument doc) except the tagsOnly-flag which determines the type of configured constrained that should be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        master - - the id of vcat configuration
        cat - - the category which configuration is used
        doc - - the document to categorize
        tagsOnly - - determines whether all configured constraints are evaluated or Visual.Tags only.
        Returns:
        VCCategoryResult of given category
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extract

        VCCategoryResult extract(String master,
                       String cat,
                       CDocument doc,
                       boolean tagsOnly)
                         throws Exception
        Extracts data from the given document with configuration of given master and category.
        This method is pretty much the same as extract(String master, String cat, CDocument doc) except the tagsOnly-flag which determines the type of configured constrained that should be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        master - - the name of vcat configuration
        cat - - the category which configuration is used
        doc - - the document to categorize
        tagsOnly - - determines whether all configured constraints are evaluated or Visual.Tags only.
        Returns:
        VCCategoryResult of given category
        Throws:
        RemoteException
        Exception

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws Exception
        Reset all initialized categorizer instances.
        This is useful if configuration has changed.
        Throws:
        Exception
